message: Element queries are a new way of thinking about responsive web design where the responsive conditions apply to elements on the page instead of the width or height of the browser.
story: Mahmoud Mohamed Zakaria shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.

caption: elementqueries.com
description: EQCSS is a CSS extension that introduces Element Queries, Scoped Styles, and new CSS selectors like $parent and $prev and more to all browsers IE8 and up
